SKT_FIRST.name: Triple Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは、自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Antipathy
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> when the caster is attacked.
description: (Triggered Effect) Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> when the caster is attacked.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)自分がダメージを受けた場合、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>反撃</color>する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Noble Swordcraft
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000010_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Defense for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000010_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Defense for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000010_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000010_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000010_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 방어력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で防御力が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
